sentences.sentence: This is handy when exchanging process models between the process modeller and e.g. a simulation tool.
sentences.translation: 当过程建模者和模拟工具之间交换过程模型的时候，这个功能非常方便。

sentences.sentence: "We don't know how much dark matter is outside of what we're measuring," says galaxy modeller Christopher Mihos of Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio.
sentences.translation: 我们不知道有多少暗物质在我们的测量之外“，俄亥俄州克里夫兰市的Case Western Reserve大学的星系建模专家Christopher Mihos说。”

sentences.sentence: But he was hardly an outcast. Though not properly trained as an economist, he had proved himself as a macroeconomic modeller, and had been made a university professor of applied economics.
sentences.translation: 即便如此，戈德利先生也很难说是一位被上帝抛弃的人———尽管他没有系统地接受经济学教育，却已向世人证明他确是一位宏观经济学大师，并且为受聘于大学的应用经济学教授，还兼任了皇家歌剧院的理事。
